# Abstract

This post stems from ideas shared in a 2023 Joint Statistical Meetings session, “Power in the Classroom: From Helping Students Play the Game to Helping Students Change the Game”, where all three of us presented.

# Audience

This post was written for [Grading for Growth](https://gradingforgrowth.com/), a newsletter / blog about the emerging revolution in grading.
